mix.title: Sorrow-Vomit: 2021-04-18 (New Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, Cold, Synth, Goth, EBM...)
mix.shortTitle: 2021-04-18 (New Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, Cold, Synth, Goth, EBM...)
mix.description:
Recorded live afternoon of Apr. 18 2021. Primarily tracks released in the month of April 2021... in the genres of Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Coldwave, Minimal Synth, Gothic, Synthpop and related.

Playlist:

  • Camlann - I'm Nobody
  • Denner - Life & Limb
  • Giant Waves - Love Is A Lie (feat. Little Nemo)
